ricochet.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if a bullet, stone, or other object ricochets, it changes direction when it hits a surface at an angle
ricochet.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Bullets ricocheted off the boulders around him.
ricochet.translation[1].definitions[0].d: something such as a bullet or a stone that has ricocheted
ricochet.translation[1].definitions[0].e: He was hit in the arm by a ricochet.
